1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey, Ross, Monica and Phoebe are there as Chandler enters

lines.Line:
(excited) Guys, guys, I've got great news! Guess what…
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Joey: Uh, ah, Monica's pregnant?!
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Monica: (shocked) Really? (She looks around, suddenly embarrassed) NEWLINE Let's get past the moment.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Phoebe: What's your news?
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Chandler: Thank you. I got a job in advertising. (Everybody cheers)
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Monica: (hugging Chandler) Oh, honey, that's incredible!
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Phoebe: (inquisitive) Gosh, what's the pay like? (Everybody NEWLINE stares at her indignantly) Oh, come on people… (defending) come NEWLINE on, now, if I don't know who makes the most, how do I know who I like the most! NEWLINE (She looks at Joey) Hey Joey! (Joey winks at her)
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Chandler: Actually, it pays nothing. It's an internship.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Joey: Oh, that's cool. We have interns at 'Days Of Our Lives'.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Chandler: Right. So, it'll be the same except… less sex with you. NEWLINE (Joey nods)
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Ross: So, uh, what kinda stuff do you think they'll have you do there?
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Chandler: Well, it's a training program, but at the end, they hire the NEWLINE people they like.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Phoebe: (enthusiastic) That's great.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Chandler: Yeah, I mean, there's probably gonna be some ground work which NEWLINE will probably stink, you know, grown man getting people coffee is a little humiliating NEWLINE
NEWLINE
NEWLINE (At the same time, Gunther puts down a cup of coffee in front of Chandler)
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Chandler: (grinning awkwardly) Humiliating and noble!
NEWLINE
NEWLINE (Gunther shoots a nasty look at him while leaving)
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Ross: You know, if I didn't already have a job, I think, I would have NEWLINE been really good in advertising.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Monica: Ross, you did not come up with got milk?
NEWLINE
NEWLINE Ross: Yes, I did, I did! (He turns to Joey, disappointed) NEWLINE I should have written it down!
NEWLINE
NEWLINE NEWLINE
